patthana14.7:1.1: Sappaccayaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.7:3.1: Sappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.7:4.1: Appaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.7:5.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… upanissaye dve …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhataṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
